cab.content: OPERATIONSFrom:- General Delme Radcliffe, Italy. To:- C.I.G.S., War Office.Despatched 11.40 p.m. 9.1,1918, Received 6.30 a.nu 10.1.1918.10106. January 9th.Evening situation 3rd Army. January 8th in afternoon moderate artillery activity especially on 23rd Corps front. 4th Army : During afternoon of January 8th enemy artillery somewhat active especially on the front of the 18th Corps, 1st Army day January 8th. Nothing of importance. Evening January 3th. Italians raided enemy advanced posts at Ca Ambrosini after short artillery preparation. Post found unoccupied; raiding party continued advance against line near Stella fort but failed to enter. They captured one prisoner.
